projects.title: Maine State Board of Education
projects.description: Get up and running within minutes. Just install the starter, add your content, deploy it, and there you go! This starter works seamlessly with hosts like Netlify. Photo by Cl√©ment H on Unsplash.

projects.title: Googe Play Change the Game
projects.description: The Google Play Change the Game Design Challenge invited youth from around the country to submit innovative mobile game ideas. I was one of around 40 winners selected for the Class of 2021, and had the opportunity to participate in a Girls Make Games mobile gaming workshop and a year-long Mentorship Program hosted by The Game Awards. Working with my mentor from the Future Class of TGA has been an incredible and eye-opening experience to learn more about a future the game industry.
